query: SELECT cu.id, cu.userId, cu.companyId, u.name, u.email, c.name as companyName FROM companyUsers cu LEFT JOIN users u ON cu.userId = u.id LEFT JOIN companies c ON cu.companyId = c.id LIMIT 10
